title: Billie Eilish: "The World’s A Little Blurry" - Live Premiere Event
author: Billie Eilish
description:
Watch the Live Premiere Event for "Billie Eilish: The World’s A Little Blurry", a new Apple Original Film, featuring a conversation with Zane Lowe and a special performance. Watch the film exclusively on Apple TV+. https://apple.co/theworldsalittleblurry

Apple TV+ is available on the Apple TV app including iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, iPod touch, Mac, select Samsung, LG, Sony and VIZIO smart TVs, Amazon Fire TV and Roku devices, Chromecast with Google TV, PlayStation and Xbox consoles, and at tv.apple.com. Just look for the Apple TV app and if you don’t have it go the App Store on your device and download it. If you’ve bought an Apple device like an iPhone, iPad or MacBook recently, you have Apple TV Plus included already.
 
The new Apple Original Film "Billie Eilish: The World’s A Little Blurry” tells the true coming-of-age story of the singer-songwriter and her rise to global superstardom. From award-winning filmmaker R.J. Cutler, the film offers a deeply intimate look at this extraordinary teenager’s journey, at just seventeen years old, navigating life on the road, on stage, and at home with her family, while writing, recording and releasing her debut album “WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?” 
 
The documentary is from Apple Original Films, in association with Interscope Films, Darkroom, This Machine and Lighthouse Management & Media. Directed by R.J. Cutler and starring Billie Eilish, Finneas O’Connell, Maggie Baird, and Patrick O’Connell as themselves. 
 
Follow Billie Eilish:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/BillieEilish​
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@billieeilish
Twitter: https://twitter.com/billieeilish​ 
Email: http://smarturl.it/BillieEilishEmail​ 
 
Shop “The World’s A Little Blurry” collection: http://store.billieeilish.com  
 
Follow Apple TV: 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/AppleTV​ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/AppleTV​ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AppleTV​ 
Giphy: https://giphy.com/AppleTV​ 
More from Apple TV: https://apple.co/32qgOEJ​ 
Subscribe to Apple TV’s YouTube channel: https://apple.co/AppleTVYouTube​ 
 
Apple TV+ is a streaming service with original stories from the most creative minds in TV and film. Watch now on the Apple TV app: https://apple.co/_AppleTVapp​ 
 
#BillieEilish​ #TheWorldsALittleBlurry​ #Documentary

localize.description:
观看《Billie Eilish.The World A Little Blurry》的现场首映活动。全新 Apple 原创电影《Billie Eilish: The World's A Little Blurry》，与 Zane Lowe 对话，并有特别演出。在Apple TV+上独家观看该片。https://apple.co/theworldsalittleblurry。

Apple TV+可在Apple TV应用中使用，包括iPhone、iPad、Apple TV、iPod touch、Mac、三星、LG、索尼和VIZIO智能电视、亚马逊Fire TV和Roku设备、Chromecast与Google TV、PlayStation和Xbox游戏机，以及tv.apple.com。只要寻找Apple TV应用程序，如果你没有它去你的设备上的App Store并下载它。如果你最近买了iPhone、iPad或MacBook等苹果设备，就已经包含了Apple TV Plus。
 
全新的苹果原创电影《Billie Eilish: The World's A Little Blurry "讲述了这位歌手和作曲家的真实成长故事，以及她在全球范围内的超级明星地位。由获奖电影制作人R.J.Cutler执导，该片深入浅出地展现了这位年仅17岁的非凡少女，在路上、舞台上、家中与家人相处，同时创作、录制并发行首张专辑 "WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO? "的历程。
 
这部纪录片由苹果原创电影公司出品，联合Interscope Films、Darkroom、This Machine和Lighthouse Management & Media。由R.J. Cutler执导，Billie Eilish、Finneas O'Connell、Maggie Baird、Patrick O'Connell等主演。
 
关注Billie Eilish。

TikTok：https://www.tiktok.com/@billieeilish
Twitter: https://twitter.com/billieeilish 
电子邮件：http://smarturl.it/BillieEilishEmail 
 
购买 "世界有点模糊 "系列：http://store.billieeilish.com。

localize.description:
觀看《Billie Eilish.The World A Little Blurry》的現場首映活動。全新 Apple 原創電影《Billie Eilish: The World's A Little Blurry》，與 Zane Lowe 對話，並有特別演出。在Apple TV+上獨家觀看該片。https://apple.co/theworldsalittleblurry。

Apple TV+可在Apple TV應用中使用，包括iPhone、iPad、Apple TV、iPod touch、Mac、三星、LG、索尼和VIZIO智能電視、亞馬遜Fire TV和Roku設備、Chromecast與Google TV、PlayStation和Xbox遊戲機，以及tv.apple.com。只要尋找Apple TV應用程序，如果你沒有它去你的設備上的App Store並下載它。如果你最近買了iPhone、iPad或MacBook等蘋果設備，就已經包含了Apple TV Plus。
 
全新的蘋果原創電影《Billie Eilish: The World's A Little Blurry "講述了這位歌手和作曲家的真實成長故事，以及她在全球範圍內的超級明星地位。由獲獎電影製作人R.J.Cutler執導，該片深入淺出地展現了這位年僅17歲的非凡少女，在路上、舞臺上、家中與家人相處，同時創作、錄製併發行首張專輯 "WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO? "的歷程。
 
這部紀錄片由蘋果原創電影公司出品，聯合Interscope Films、Darkroom、This Machine和Lighthouse Management & Media。由R.J. Cutler執導，Billie Eilish、Finneas O'Connell、Maggie Baird、Patrick O'Connell等主演。
